Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing Clark/Division
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Division due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Division due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: 95th-bounf Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due topolice activity.

Allow extra travel time.
